 Formel Breaker makes use of the mXparser-library by Mariusz Gromada: 

mXparser: Copyright 2010-2017 MARIUSZ GROMADA. All rights reserved. You may use this software under the condition of Simplified BSD License.

Formel Breaker Deluxe offers you: 
 
 -> An extensive directory of constants with exact values and units 
 
 -> A separate unit converter with exact value and conversion tables for each unit 
 
 -> A lot more formulas from the fields of interest calculation, economy, optics, astrophysics and more 
 
 -> Higher rounding precision for even more exact calculations with very small number 
 
 All that and more Formel Breaker Deluxe has to offer you without any ads and for only 2.49€ 
 
 Now available on the Google Play Store
